name: Enter required data and click on Submit WFH

testSteps.description: 1: Enter required data and click on Submit WFH ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=Apply, defaultTab=Leave, tab=Work From Home, heading=Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "Apply" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
And Verify "Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request" of "Apply" tab
When User clicks on "Work From Home" Tab
Then Select date from "Work From Home" date dropdown
And Enter reason "WFH leave" for leave
Then Click on Submit button for WFH tab
And Verify Leave is submitted and "Request processed successfully" appears

userStory.narrative: This tests are for Apply module of MIS Beta

title: Enter required data and click on Submit WFH

values: Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "<childTab>" sub tab of "<parentTab>" tab
And Verify "<heading>" of "<childTab>" tab
And Verify "<defaultTab>" displays by default
When User clicks on "<tab>" Tab
And Verify "<tab>" displays
Then Select date from "<tab>" date dropdown
And Enter reason "WFH leave" for leave
Then Click on Submit button for WFH tab
And Verify Leave is submitted and "Request processed successfully" appears
